name: Protfolio Website
desc: My protfolio website built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. It is hosted on AWS S3 and CloudFront, with CI/CD Workflow to deploy the website automatically for any changes.

name: Sealing Website
desc: Built a website for my father's company. It's built with React, Tailwind CSS, and TypeScript. It's hosted on AWS S3 and CloudFront, and have a fully CI/CD Pipeline.

name: ShodApp Application
desc: A full-stack application built with React frontend, Node.js backend, and PostgreSQL database. Features include user authentication, Shodan API integration, and real-time data visualization. The application is containerized and deployed using Kubernetes.

name: ShodApp Infrastructure
desc: Infrastructure as Code (IaC) project using Terraform to provision AWS resources including EKS cluster, RDS, and networking components. Implements GitOps with ArgoCD for continuous deployment and GitHub Actions for infrastructure CI/CD. Features automated infrastructure testing and deployment workflows.
